title: 6-Aryl-4-cycloamino-1,3,5-triazine-2-amines: synthesis, antileukemic activity, and 3D-QSAR modelling
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8264-8282
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08091A, Paper

Muhammad Syafiq Bin Shahari, Ahmad Junaid, Edward R. T. Tiekink, Anton V. Dolzhenko
New potent and selective antileukemic agents were identified in the screening of 94 compounds prepared using a convenient one-pot three-component approach.
